item.title: fixing-atom-and-idea-file-refresh-issue
item.description: Fixing limit of watch issue sudo vi /etc/sysctl.d/max_user_watches.conf write fs.inotify.max_user_watches = 524288 the file sudo sysctl -p --system restart atom or idea Reference https://github.com/atom/atom/blob/master/docs/build-instructions/linux.md#typeerror-unable-to-watch-path https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/IDEADEV/Inotify+Watches+Limit
